import { Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from './routes.module.scss' import Layout from 'layout' import WishList from './WishList' import SearchResult from './SearchResult' import store from 'store' import { themeState } from 'states/system' import { useRecoil } from 'hooks/state' import { useEffect } from 'react' import NewMain from './NewMain' import BookCard from './BookCard' import Recommend from './Recommend' import Detail from './Detail' import NewMyPage from './NewMyPage' import SearchBook from './BookCard/SearchBook' import BookRating from './NewMyPage/BookRating' import BookWant from './NewMyPage/BookWant' import BookReading from './NewMyPage/BookReading' const App = () => { const [theme] = useRecoil(themeState) if (!store.get('searchStore')) { store.set('searchStore', []) } if (!store.get('likeStore')) { store.set('likeStore', []) } if (!store.get('readingStore')) { store.set('readingStore', []) } if (!store.get('ratingStore')) { store.set('ratingStore', []) } useEffect(() => { document.documentElement.setAttribute('color-theme', theme) }, [theme]) return (
}> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> Not Found
} />
) } export default App
